doc:
Leo Willis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leo_Willis 0 Leo Willis (5 January 1890 – 10 April 1952) was an American actor who began his career in the silent era. He played mainly tough guys and comic villains, notably opposite Harold Lloyd, Charley Chase, and Laurel and Hardy at the Hal Roach Studios. Leo_Willis ( 5_January_1890 – 10_April_1952 ) was an_American_actor who began his_career in the_silent_era . He played mainly_tough_guys and comic_villains , notably_opposite_Harold_Lloyd , Charley_Chase , and Laurel_and_Hardy at the_Hal_Roach_Studios .
